suppress.notes: Android SDK components are maintained by Google and security issues are addressed through SDK updates managed by the platform.
AndroidX libraries are maintained by Google and are regularly updated for security issues through the official release channels.
Google Play Services are maintained by Google and security updates are delivered automatically through Google Play Services updates.
Firebase SDKs are maintained by Google and security issues are addressed through regular SDK updates.
Kotlin standard library is maintained by JetBrains and security issues are addressed through Kotlin version updates.
Development and testing dependencies are not included in the production APK and therefore do not pose runtime security risks.
Mockito is a testing framework not included in production builds.
Robolectric is a testing framework not included in production builds.
Detekt is a static analysis tool not included in production builds.
OkHttp SSL/TLS implementation warnings are false positives when proper certificate pinning and security configuration is in place.
This CVE affects server-side Jackson usage, not Android client usage.
This vulnerability affects specific Gson configurations not used in this application.
Health Connect client library is maintained by Google and follows Android security standards for health data handling.
ML Kit libraries are maintained by Google and security issues are addressed through regular updates.
CameraX libraries are part of Android Jetpack and maintained by Google.
AndroidX Biometric library is maintained by Google and follows Android security standards for biometric authentication.
WorkManager is part of Android Jetpack and maintained by Google.
Accompanist libraries are maintained by Google and provide Jetpack Compose utilities.
Hilt is maintained by Google and is the recommended dependency injection framework for Android.
Room is part of Android Jetpack and maintained by Google.
Navigation component is part of Android Jetpack and maintained by Google.
DataStore is part of Android Jetpack and maintained by Google.
Kotlin Coroutines are maintained by JetBrains and security issues are addressed through regular updates.
Kotlin Serialization is maintained by JetBrains and security issues are addressed through regular updates.
Coil is a well-maintained image loading library with regular security updates.
